page.title: 02SHOPS AND POST OFFICES
page.content: Beaumont-cum-Moze{Post Office}owned by Mrs.Cuttings does only post office business.Stones Green{Post Office owned by Mrs.Palmer sells groceries, sweets and stationery.In Great Oakley the{Post Office}and Mace shop is owned by Mr.and Mrs.Reilly.It sells fruit, {groceries,}vegetables stationery and sweets.The Mini Stores in Great Oakley is owned by Mrs. Waddington.She sells sweets,{newspapers, groceries}and toys.The florists shop is owned by Miss Hooks.She sells seeds, silk flowers and garden tools. The butchers is owned by Mr.Markham.It sells meat, potatoes, eggs and tinned food. Most people go to Harwich,Colchester or Clacton weekly to do their main shopping.A few people go to these places monthly.Only a few people do most of their shopping in the village.
